title: (x) Flare serif on Avatar's international poster - Penumbra Serif {Mark S}
content:
Anyone know what font this is for all the words EXCEPT Avatar?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100107130530im_/http:/typophile.com/files/poster_avatar_ver2_3978.jpg)
author: Grifter730

comments.content: My guess would have been Albertus, the capitals of which are much less distinctive than the lower-case.
